alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:46AM CDT until June 14 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 346 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watts, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Cave Springs... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... Lake Francis... Fairmount... Ballard... Healing Springs... Gallitin... Rocky Comfort... Natural Falls State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
